item.description:
After a short respite, we're back to Snookers for the weekly outing for Trivia with Tucker. We've got the 2nd place prize from 2 weeks ago to spend (only $10).

Sadly, after being in first place with a good group of first time trivia players last Tuesday at Trinity, we were not able to take home any fabulous parting gifts (well, aside from new friendships).

Trivia starts at 8PM and runs until 10PM.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a meetup sign on the table.
item.why: Great conversation, fun people, a fun game, good music (usually), and an over the to trivia master.
item.name: Earning more Trivia Prizes @ Snookers
